name: Hippo Simulator
description:
A simulation game based on the growing hippo population in Colombia. Showcases how large mammals can shape their environment. You play as a member of the Melon Valley Preservation Committee tasked with measuring how four invasive hippos are changing the Valley.

To play the game, start by clicking "Begin simulation". Use left click to interact with the world, and right click to get help on what various tools/settings mean.

The Tools tab lets you select various tools. The Lab tab shows various environmental measurements. The Settings tab allows you to view a graph of Melon Valley's progress, among other options.
